name: Miniscule Frenzy
description:
Ludum Dare 38 game!

Miniscule Frenzy is a retro platformer which tops off fluid movements and tight controls with nostalgic art and a soundtrack to die for!

Art by Dante Lundell - Theihe

Programming by David Styrbjörn - Mieeh

Music by Eli Coutch – Re:Coutch

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Spacebar also works for jumping.

Shift or Z to sprint.

E or X to activate your toggle.

ESC to pause.

M to mute

Join us on Discord!
